author: sky.cactus
content: <@!104006934562107392> Does the greeter bot just auto-reply to all new issues and PRs now?

author: sky.cactus
content: I *think* the decision was to have the greeter pipe up on every issue, but not every PR.

author: sky.cactus
content: At the moment, it feels excessive to have it pipe up on every PR but I don't feel particularly strongly about that and I can see myself being convinced otherwise.
